full_summary:
# RFP for SHC Office Modification

## Important Details

* **Tender Title:** Requests for Proposal (RFP) B - SHC Office Modification - Dorchester
* **Reference Number:** WS3930685700-Doc4004927150
* **Amendment Number:** Amendment 3
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3930685700
* **Publication Date:** May 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 30, 2023, 2:00 PM ADT
* **Amendment Date:** May 24, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 25, 2023 (Original)
* **Contract Status:** **Expired**

## Background

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement for modifying the existing Shepody Healing Center (SHC) offices located in the Dorchester Institution. This request for proposals (RFP) is against the Supply Arrangement (SA) E0225-152290 for Architecture and Interior Design Services.

## Objective

The primary objective of this RFP is to solicit proposals for the modification of the existing SHC offices to meet the requirements of the CSC.

## Scope of Work

The scope of work includes the design and planning of the SHC office modifications.

## Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* **Technical Merit:** The design and planning of the SHC office modifications will be evaluated based on their technical merit, including their feasibility, cost, and scheduling.
* **Price:** The price of the proposals will be evaluated to ensure that the lowest price is selected.

## Instructions to Bidders

* Proposals must be submitted only via SAP Ariba.
* Proposals must be submitted in either English or French.
* Bidders must confirm that they have reviewed and understood the terms and conditions of the RFP.

## Contact Information

* Department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Miller, Rachel (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Address: Atlantic Region Acquisitions, 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, N.S. B3J 1T3
